< {#apatyam#}¦ [{#na patanti pitaro'nena, pat bAhu° karaRe yat na#}.{# ta#}.{#;#}
<  some derive it from {#apa,#} the termination {#tya#} being added to it,
<  as in {#tatratya, atratya,#} sprung from a stock; Yāska gives two etymologies:
